titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for regulating the colours to be worn on merchant ships
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the eighteenth day of September 1674, in the six and twentieth year of our reign."
Printed as a broadside, now in 2 leaves.
Reproduction of original in: Universität Göttingen Bibliothek.
